title: Proposed Schema for the DDoS Info Sharing Project

IPaddress.description: The source of the DDoS attack packet. IPv4 or IPv6

FirstSeen.description: RFC 3339 formatted time stamp when the attacker info was first tracked

LastSeen.description: RFC 3339 formatted time stamp when the attacker info was last tracked

NumberOfTimes.description: The number represents the count of the attacks from the specific IP Address

City.description: The location of the IP Address based on geo IP info

State.description: The location of the IP Address based on geo IP info

Country.description: The country associated with the IP Address, formatted as an ISO alpha-2 code

TotalBPS.description: Value represents the volume of traffic in bytes per second sent during this attack

TotalPPS.description: Value represents the volume of traffic in packets per second sent during this attack

SourceASN.description: The AS Number of the network owner from where the attack traffic is coming

AttackType.description: Information about the type of attack

SourcePort.description: The port number from which the traffic is coming

DestPort.description: The port number to which the traffic is directed. This helps in determining the protocol

ProviderName.description: The name of the operator providing the data

ProviderASN.description: The AS Number of the operator providing the data
